div.p: No. 1342, pp. 522-3, unit 25, VPRS 1187/P, outward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office of Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Botanic Gardens
The memorandum is approval of the requests made in M to J. McCulloch, 11 April 1871 (in this edition as 71-04-11b). Annotated with file number Z4165.
